name: Boreal Forest
description:
You play a faerie trying to save a forest.  Fly into tree stumps to bring trees back to life. Controls are WASD for movement, E to fly up and Q to fly down, hold Left Shift to fly faster and 1 to lock mouse . Every time you hit a wall you will lose health and every time you heal a tree your flying speed will increase!

This game was made in less than a day, approximately 9 to 11 hrs were spent making it!

I made a YouTube video about the whole process, link will be available soon!
